# Jaraba Impact Platform — AI Agents & MCP Discovery
# https://llmstxt.org/
# NOTE: This is a static fallback. The dynamic version at /llms.txt
# is generated by LlmsTxtController with real-time data.

> Jaraba Impact Platform is a multi-tenant SaaS ecosystem with AI-native
> architecture for digital transformation across verticals.

## AI Agents (Gen 2 — SmartBaseAgent)

- SmartMarketing Agent: Multi-channel marketing campaigns
- Storytelling Agent: Brand narrative and impact storytelling
- CustomerExperience Agent: Customer journey optimization
- Support Agent: Intelligent customer support with escalation
- ProducerCopilot Agent: Agricultural producer assistant
- Sales Agent: Sales funnel optimization
- MerchantCopilot Agent: Merchant operations and inventory
- Content Writer Agent: AI-assisted blog content creation

## MCP Server

- Endpoint: POST /api/v1/mcp
- Protocol: JSON-RPC 2.0
- Methods: initialize, tools/list, tools/call, ping
- Auth: CSRF token (X-CSRF-Token header)

## Streaming

- Endpoint: POST /api/v1/copilot/stream
- Protocol: Server-Sent Events (SSE)
- Events: chunk, cached, thinking, mode, done, error

## Model Tiers

- fast: Claude Haiku 4.5 (quick responses)
- balanced: Claude Sonnet 4.6 (general tasks)
- premium: Claude Opus 4.6 (complex reasoning)

## APIs

- GET /api/v1/content/articles: Published blog articles
- GET /api/v1/pricing/{vertical}: Public pricing
- POST /api/v1/copilot/stream: AI copilot (SSE)
- POST /api/v1/mcp: MCP server (JSON-RPC 2.0)

## Contact

- Platform: https://plataformadeecosistemas.es
- Technical: tech@jarabaosc.com
- Support: soporte@jarabaosc.com

## Compliance

- GDPR compliant (EU data processing)
- SEPE homologation ready (Spanish employment training)
- Open Badges 3.0 for certifications
